info.title: Shaghlny - Job Hiring Platform API
info.description: API documentation for Shaghlny - Job Hiring Platform

get.description: Returns a message instructing the user on how to submit a job position.

message.example: Use this endpoint to submit position details.

post.summary: Store a new job position with associated questions
post.description: Store a new job position with a title, description, location, and optional questions.

example: What is your experience with PHP?

201.description: Job position and questions created successfully

get.summary: Get job statistics and charts data
get.description: Retrieve job statistics data including job types, job counts by month, and job titles with counts.

get.summary: Get list of jobs with recommendations
get.description: Fetch jobs and recommended jobs based on user's profile skills.
Fetch jobs that have associated questions.
Fetch jobs that the authenticated user has applied to.

post.description: Apply for a job if not already applied.

get.summary: Get recommended jobs based on user skills
get.description: Get jobs that match the user's profile skills.
Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user.

put.description: Update the profile of the authenticated user with the provided data.

get.description: Ensure a profile exists for the authenticated user and retrieve it for editing.

get.summary: Get all items in the user's wishlist
get.description: Retrieve the wishlist items for the authenticated user.

post.summary: Add a job to the user's wishlist
post.description: Add a specified job to the wishlist of the authenticated user.

error.example: This job is already in your wishlist

delete.summary: Remove a job from the user's wishlist
delete.description: Remove a specified job from the wishlist of the authenticated user.

error.example: Job not found in your wishlist

tags.name: Company
tags.description: Operations related to managing company job positions

tags.name: Home
tags.description: Operations related to the home page and job statistics
